newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Anzoil AZL reports gas shows in Vietnam well.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Anzoil AZL reports gas shows in Vietnam well.

text.p: Anzoil (Asia) Pte Ltd, operator of the onshore Hanoi Basin production sharing contract in northern Vietnam, has begun coring at a depth of 3,953 metres in the Song Tra Ly D14-3 appraisal well after recording gas shows, Anzoil NL said on Tuesday.
"The decision to begin coring was made after good gas shows were recorded from sandstones drilled over the interval 3952 - 3953 metres in measured depth," Anzoil said.
The gas shows are of a similar magnitude to those noted while drilling gas bearing sandstones in the D14-IX and D14-2 wells, Anzoil said.
The zones will be further evaluated with logs after the well reaches planned total depth of 4,073 metres, Anzoil said.
Anzoil holds 80 percent of Anzoil (Asia) Pte Ltd and Frontier Petroleum NL owns 20 percent.
